title: Add animated Performance Gallery to Case Study 1

requirements.text: Create a Performance Gallery subsection at the end of Case Study 1 (VRH Derma) that displays 2 Meta Ads performance screenshots showing campaign metrics including ₹1.45L and ₹3.48L total spend, 2.6M and 6.3M impressions, and detailed campaign breakdowns with results, cost per result, reach, and conversion rates

quotes: Add performance screenshots inside each Case Study section
both photos are to be added in the case study 1 in the last

acceptanceCriteria: Performance Gallery subsection appears at the end of Case Study 1
Both uploaded Meta Ads screenshots are displayed showing VR Health Science campaign data
Images are arranged in a clean grid layout

requirements.text: Implement fade-in animation on scroll for Performance Gallery images that triggers when the gallery enters the viewport, with smooth slide-up animation effect synchronized with the fade-in

quotes: Images should fade in on scroll
Add smooth slide-up animation when entering viewport

acceptanceCriteria: Images fade in smoothly when scrolled into view
Slide-up animation occurs simultaneously with fade-in
Animation uses existing useScrollAnimation hook pattern from the codebase

requirements.text: Add hover effects to Performance Gallery images with subtle 1.03x scale zoom and soft shadow, ensuring the animation is smooth and professional without aggressive motion

quotes: On hover, slightly scale up (subtle 1.03 zoom)
No flashy bounce or aggressive motion

acceptanceCriteria: Images scale to 1.03x on hover with smooth transition
Soft shadow appears on hover
Hover effect is subtle and professional, consistent with existing portfolio animations

requirements.text: Implement modal lightbox functionality that opens when a Performance Gallery image is clicked, with smooth fade transition, darkened background overlay, and left/right navigation arrows to switch between images when multiple images exist

quotes: Clicking image should open a modal lightbox view with smooth fade transition
Allow left/right navigation if multiple images exist

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking an image opens a modal lightbox with enlarged view
Modal has smooth fade-in transition
Background dims when modal is open
Left and right navigation arrows allow switching between the 2 images
Clicking outside the image or pressing ESC closes the modal

requirements.text: Style the Performance Gallery with the existing green/black/white theme, adding thin black borders around each screenshot, using a 2-column grid layout on desktop and 1-column layout on mobile, maintaining consistency with the portfolio's professional design system

quotes: Add thin black border around each screenshot
Use clean grid layout (2 per row on desktop, 1 per row on mobile)

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery uses green (#22c55e), black (#000000), and white (#FFFFFF) from existing theme
Each screenshot has a thin black border
Desktop layout displays 2 images per row
Mobile layout displays 1 image per row
Styling is consistent with existing CaseStudies.tsx component design

requirements.text: Optimize Performance Gallery images for fast loading using lazy loading, ensuring mobile responsiveness and maintaining performance standards across all viewport sizes

quotes: Optimize image size for fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: Images use lazy loading attribute
Gallery is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Images are optimized for web delivery
Performance metrics remain acceptable with image additions

requirements.text: Do not modify the existing case study text content in CaseStudies.tsx, only add the Performance Gallery component and subsection at the end of Case Study 1 (VRH Derma case study)

quotes: Do not change case study text content. Only enhance with animated performance image gallery

acceptanceCriteria: VRH Derma case study text remains unchanged
Performance Gallery is added as a new subsection after existing content
Award-Wala case study remains unmodified

constraints: Do not modify existing case study text content in CaseStudies.tsx
Keep animations smooth and professional without aggressive motion
Use existing useScrollAnimation hook pattern for scroll-triggered animations
nonGoals: Adding Performance Galleries to other case studies beyond Case Study 1
Creating new case study content or modifying existing case study text
Implementing backend data storage for images
Creating admin interface for managing performance screenshots

required: Meta Ads performance dashboard screenshot showing VR Health Science campaigns with ₹1.45L total spend, 1.3M impressions, 571K reach, and detailed campaign metrics in tabular format (meta-ads-performance-1.dim_1200x800.png)

Meta Ads performance dashboard screenshot displaying VR Health Science campaigns with ₹3.48L total spend, 6.3M impressions, 2.1M reach, and campaign breakdown with form leads data (meta-ads-performance-2.dim_1200x800.png)
